topic.name: Spell List I
topic.para: Spell List I

An M or F appearing at the end of a spell's name in the spell lists denotes a spell with a material or focus component, respectively, that is not normally included in a spell component pouch. An X denotes a spell with an XP component paid by the caster.

topic.name: Order of Presentation
topic.para: Order of Presentation: In the spell lists and the spell descriptions that follow them, the spells are presented in alphabetical order by name except for those belonging to certain spell chains.
When a spell's name begins with 'lesser,' 'greater,' or 'mass,' the spell description is alphabetized under the second word of the spell name instead.

topic.name: Hit Dice
topic.para: Hit Dice: The term 'Hit Dice' is used synonymously with 'character levels' for effects that affect a number of Hit Dice of creatures. Creatures with Hit Dice only from their race, not from classes, have character levels equal to their Hit Dice.

topic.name: Caster Level
topic.para: Caster Level: A spell's power often depends on caster level, which is defined as the caster's class level for the purpose of casting a particular spell. A creature with no classes has a caster level equal to its Hit Dice unless otherwise specified. The word 'level' in the spell lists that follow always refers to caster level.

topic.para: 1 Cure Light Wounds: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).

topic.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
topic.para: 2 Cure Moderate Wounds: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level (max +10).

topic.name: Cure Serious Wounds
topic.para: 3 Cure Serious Wounds: Cures 3d8 damage +1/level (max +15).

topic.name: Cure Critical Wounds
topic.para: 4 Cure Critical Wounds: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +20).

topic.name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
topic.para: 5 Cure Light Wounds, Mass: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level (max +25) for many creatures.

topic.name: Heal
topic.para: 6 Heal: Cures 10 points/level of damage, all diseases and mental conditions.

topic.name: Regenerate
topic.para: 7 Regenerate: Subject's severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

topic.name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
topic.para: 8 Cure Critical Wounds, Mass: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +40) for many creatures.

topic.name: Heal, Mass
topic.para: 9 Heal, Mass: As heal, but with several subjects.

topic.name: Knowledge Domain
topic.para: Knowledge Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: Add all Knowledge skills to your list of cleric class skills.
You cast divination spells at +1 caster level.

topic.name: Detect Secret Doors
topic.para: 1 Detect Secret Doors: Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

topic.name: Detect Thoughts
topic.para: 2 Detect Thoughts: Allows 'listening' to surface thoughts.

topic.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
topic.para: 3 Clairaudience/Clairvoyance: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

topic.name: Divination
topic.para: 4 DivinationM: Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

topic.name: True Seeing
topic.para: 5 True SeeingM: Lets you see all things as they really are.

topic.name: Find the Path
topic.para: 6 Find the Path: Shows most direct way to a location.

topic.name: Legend Lore
topic.para: 7 Legend LoreMF: Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

topic.name: Discern Location
topic.para: 8 Discern Location: Reveals exact location of creature or object.

topic.name: Foresight
topic.para: 9 Foresight: 'Sixth sense' warns of impending danger.

topic.name: Law Domain
topic.para: Law Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: You cast law spells at +1 caster level.

topic.name: Protection from Chaos
topic.para: 1 Protection from Chaos: +2 to AC and saves, counter mind control, hedge out elementals and outsiders.

topic.name: Calm Emotions
topic.para: 2 Calm Emotions: Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

topic.name: Magic Circle Against Chaos
topic.para: 3 Magic Circle against Chaos: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

topic.name: Order's Wrath
topic.para: 4 Order's Wrath: Damages and dazes chaotic creatures.

topic.name: Dispel Chaos
topic.para: 5 Dispel Chaos: +4 bonus against attacks by chaotic creatures.

topic.name: Hold Monster
topic.para: 6 Hold Monster: As hold person, but any creature.

topic.name: Dictum
topic.para: 7 Dictum: Kills, paralyzes, slows, or deafens nonlawful subjects.

topic.name: Shield of Law
topic.para: 8 Shield of LawF: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and spell resistance 25 against chaotic spells.

topic.name: Summon Monster IX
topic.para: 9 Summon Monster IX*: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.
*Cast as a law spell only.

topic.name: Luck Domain
topic.para: Luck Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: You gain the power of good fortune, which is usable once per day. This extraordinary ability allows you to reroll one roll that you have just made before the DM declares whether the roll results in success or failure. You must take the result of the reroll, even if it's worse than the original roll.

topic.name: Entropic Shield
topic.para: 1 Entropic Shield: Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.

topic.name: Aid
topic.para: 2 Aid: +1 on attack rolls, +1 against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max +10).

topic.name: Protection from Energy
topic.para: 3 Protection from Energy: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

topic.name: Freedom of Movement
topic.para: 4 Freedom of Movement: Subject moves normally despite impediments.

topic.name: Break Enchantment
topic.para: 5 Break Enchantment: Frees subjects from enchantments, alterations, curses, and petrification.

topic.name: Mislead
topic.para: 6 Mislead: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

topic.name: Spell Turning
topic.para: 7 Spell Turning: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.

topic.name: Moment of Prescience
topic.para: 8 Moment of Prescience: You gain insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

topic.name: Miracle
topic.para: 9 MiracleX: Requests a deity's intercession.

topic.name: Magic Domain
topic.para: Magic Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: Use scrolls, wands, and other devices with spell completion or spell trigger activation as a wizard of one-half your cleric level (at least 1st level). For the purpose of using a scroll or other magic device, if you are also a wizard, actual wizard levels and these effective wizard levels stack.

topic.name: Magic Aura
topic.para: 1 Magic Aura: Alters object's magic aura.

topic.name: Identify
topic.para: 2 Identify: Determines properties of magic item.

topic.name: Dispel Magic
topic.para: 3 Dispel Magic: Cancels magical spells and effects.

topic.name: Imbue with Spell Ability
topic.para: 4 Imbue with Spell Ability: Transfer spells to subject.

topic.name: Spell Resistance
topic.para: 5 Spell Resistance: Subject gains spell resistance 12 + level.

topic.name: Antimagic Field
topic.para: 6 Antimagic Field: Negates magic within 10 ft.

topic.name: Spell Turning
topic.para: 7 Spell Turning: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.

topic.name: Protection from Spells
topic.para: 8 Protection from SpellsMF: Confers +8 resistance bonus.

topic.name: Mage's Disjunction
topic.para: 9 Mage's Disjunction: Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.

topic.name: Plant Domain
topic.para: Plant Domain

topic.name: Granted Powers
topic.para: Granted Powers: Rebuke or command plant creatures as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. Use this ability a total number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. This granted power is a supernatural ability.
Add Knowledge (nature) to your list of cleric class skills.

topic.name: Entangle
topic.para: 1 Entangle: Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft. -radius.

topic.name: Barkskin
topic.para: 2 Barkskin: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.

topic.name: Plant Growth
topic.para: 3 Plant Growth: Grows vegetation, improves crops.

topic.name: Command Plants
topic.para: 4 Command Plants: Sway the actions of one or more plant creatures.

topic.name: Wall of Thorns
topic.para: 5 Wall of Thorns: Thorns damage anyone who tries to pass.

topic.name: Repel Wood
topic.para: 6 Repel Wood: Pushes away wooden objects.

topic.name: Animate Plants
topic.para: 7 Animate Plants: One or more trees animate and fight for you.

topic.name: Control Plants
topic.para: 8 Control Plants: Control actions of one or more plant creatures.

topic.name: Shambler
topic.para: 9 Shambler: Summons 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.

topic.name: Protection Domain
topic.para: Protection Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: You can generate a protective ward as a supernatural ability. Grant someone you touch a resistance bonus equal to your cleric level on his or her next saving throw. Activating this power is a standard action. The protective ward is an abjuration effect with a duration of 1 hour that is usable once per day.

topic.name: Sanctuary
topic.para: 1 Sanctuary: Opponents can't attack you, and you can't attack.

topic.name: Shield Other
topic.para: 2 Shield OtherF: You take half of subject's damage.

topic.name: Protection from Energy
topic.para: 3 Protection from Energy: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

topic.name: Spell Immunity
topic.para: 4 Spell Immunity: Subject is immune to one spell per four levels.

topic.name: Spell Resistance
topic.para: 5 Spell Resistance: Subject gains spell resistance 12 + level.

topic.name: Antimagic Field
topic.para: 6 Antimagic Field: Negates magic within 10 ft.

topic.name: Repulsion
topic.para: 7 Repulsion: Creatures can't approach you.

topic.name: Mind Blank
topic.para: 8 Mind Blank: Subject is immune to mental/emotional magic and scrying.

topic.name: Prismatic Sphere
topic.para: 9 Prismatic Sphere: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

topic.name: Strength Domain
topic.para: Strength Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: You can perform a feat of strength as a supernatural ability. You gain an enhancement bonus to Strength equal to your cleric level. Activating the power is a free action, the power lasts 1 round, and it is usable once per day.

topic.name: Enlarge Person
topic.para: 1 Enlarge Person: Humanoid creature doubles in size.

topic.name: Bull's Strength
topic.para: 2 Bull's Strength: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

topic.name: Magic Vestment
topic.para: 3 Magic Vestment: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.

topic.name: Spell Immunity
topic.para: 4 Spell Immunity: Subject is immune to one spell per four levels.

topic.name: Righteous Might
topic.para: 5 Righteous Might: Your size increases, and you gain combat bonuses.

topic.name: Stoneskin
topic.para: 6 StoneskinM: Ignore 10 points of damage per attack.

topic.name: Grasping Hand
topic.para: 7 Grasping Hand: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.

topic.name: Clenched Fist
topic.para: 8 Clenched Fist: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or attacks your foes.

topic.name: Crushing Hand
topic.para: 9 Crushing Hand: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or crushes your foes.

topic.name: Sun Domain
topic.para: Sun Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: Once per day, you can perform a greater turning against undead in place of a regular turning. The greater turning is like a normal turning except that the undead creatures that would be turned are destroyed instead.

topic.name: Endure Elements
topic.para: 1 Endure Elements: Exist comfortably in hot or cold environments.

topic.name: Heat Metal
topic.para: 2 Heat Metal: Make metal so hot it damages those who touch it.

topic.name: Searing Light
topic.para: 3 Searing Light: Ray deals 1d8/two levels, more against undead.

topic.name: Fire Shield
topic.para: 4 Fire Shield: Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you're protected from heat or cold.

topic.name: Flame Strike
topic.para: 5 Flame Strike: Smite foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

topic.name: Fire Seeds
topic.para: 6 Fire Seeds: Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.

topic.name: Sunbeam
topic.para: 7 Sunbeam: Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.

topic.name: Sunburst
topic.para: 8 Sunburst: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

topic.name: Prismatic Sphere
topic.para: 9 Prismatic Sphere: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

topic.name: Travel Domain
topic.para: Travel Domain

topic.name: Granted Powers
topic.para: Granted Powers: For a total time per day of 1 round per cleric level you possess, you can act normally regardless of magical effects that impede movement as if you were affected by the spell freedom of movement. This effect occurs automatically as soon as it applies, lasts until it runs out or is no longer needed, and can operate multiple times per day (up to the total daily limit of rounds).
This granted power is a supernatural ability.
Add Survival to your list of cleric class skills.

topic.name: Longstrider
topic.para: 1 Longstrider: Increases your speed.

topic.name: Locate Object
topic.para: 2 Locate Object: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

topic.name: Fly
topic.para: 3 Fly: Subject flies at speed of 60 ft.

topic.name: Dimension Door
topic.para: 4 Dimension Door: Teleports you short distance.

topic.name: Teleport
topic.para: 5 Teleport: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles/level.

topic.name: Find the Path
topic.para: 6 Find the Path: Shows most direct way to a location.

topic.name: Teleport, Greater
topic.para: 7 Teleport, Greater: As teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.

topic.name: Phase Door
topic.para: 8 Phase Door: Creates an invisible passage through wood or stone.

topic.name: Astral Projection
topic.para: 9 Astral ProjectionM: Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.

topic.name: Trickery Domain
topic.para: Trickery Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: Add Bluff, Disguise, and Hide to your list of cleric class skills.

topic.name: Disguise Self
topic.para: 1 Disguise Self: Disguise own appearance.

topic.name: Invisibility
topic.para: 2 Invisibility: Subject invisible 1 min./level or until it attacks.

topic.name: Nondetection
topic.para: 3 NondetectionM: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

topic.name: Confusion
topic.para: 4 Confusion: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.

topic.name: False Vision
topic.para: 5 False VisionM: Fools scrying with an illusion.

topic.name: Mislead
topic.para: 6 Mislead: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

topic.name: Screen
topic.para: 7 Screen: Illusion hides area from vision, scrying.

topic.name: Polymorph Any Object
topic.para: 8 Polymorph Any Object: Changes any subject into anything else.

topic.name: Time Stop
topic.para: 9 Time Stop: You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.

topic.name: War Domain
topic.para: War Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: Free Martial Weapon Proficiency with deity's favored weapon (if necessary) and Weapon Focus with the deity's favored weapon.

topic.name: Magic Weapon
topic.para: 1 Magic Weapon: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

topic.name: Spiritual Weapon
topic.para: 2 Spiritual Weapon: Magical weapon attacks on its own.

topic.name: Magic Vestment
topic.para: 3 Magic Vestment: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.

topic.name: Divine Power
topic.para: 4 Divine Power: You gain attack bonus, +6 to Str, and 1 hp/level.

topic.name: Flame Strike
topic.para: 5 Flame Strike: Smite foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

topic.name: Blade Barrier
topic.para: 6 Blade Barrier: Wall of blades deals 1d6/level damage.

topic.name: Power Word Blind
topic.para: 7 Power Word Blind: Blinds creature with 200 hp or less.

topic.name: Power Word Stun
topic.para: 8 Power Word Stun: Stuns creature with 150 hp or less.

topic.name: Power Word Kill
topic.para: 9 Power Word Kill: Kills creature with 100 hp or less.

topic.name: Water Domain
topic.para: Water Domain

topic.name: Granted Power
topic.para: Granted Power: Turn or destroy fire creatures as a good cleric turns undead. Rebuke, command, or bolster water creatures as an evil cleric rebukes undead. Use these abilities a total number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. This granted power is a supernatural ability.

topic.name: Obscuring Mist
topic.para: 1 Obscuring Mist: Fog surrounds you.

topic.name: Fog Cloud
topic.para: 2 Fog Cloud: Fog obscures vision.

topic.name: Water Breathing
topic.para: 3 Water Breathing: Subjects can breathe underwater.

topic.name: Control Water
topic.para: 4 Control Water: Raises or lowers bodies of water.

topic.name: Ice Storm
topic.para: 5 Ice Storm: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

topic.name: Cone of Cold
topic.para: 6 Cone of Cold: 1d6/level cold damage.

topic.name: Acid Fog
topic.para: 7 Acid Fog: Fog deals acid damage.

topic.name: Horrid Wilting
topic.para: 8 Horrid Wilting: Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

topic.name: Elemental Swarm
topic.para: 9 Elemental Swarm*: Summons multiple elementals.
*Cast as a water spell only.
